Text.Page:
While you're here...you know, it would probably be best to take their leader out.

His name is Sidurek, and he seems to have appeared at the same time our people starting getting sick...when they started turning..."So killing him should give us another clue?"

I'm hoping, yes.

{@linkcreature:19#4009#Sidurek} is probably deep inside the rebels' camp, so be careful of his guards.

Is he dead? Good. That's good. Did you find any clues?

A letter? Give it here.

It speaks of someone named Malachai, a plan, and an item Sidurek received. Hmm.

We must find out more.
You must destroy Sidurek before things get even further out of control.
